name: Hotel Malte - Astotel
description: Located in the 2nd district next to the Stock Exchange, the Louvre and Place des Victoires, Hotel Malta provides a superb location for a memorable stay. Whether you want to shop in the heart of the department store neighbourhood or visit one of the main business centres of Paris, Malta Hotel is the place to be. Elegantly concealed behind a facade dating from the seventeenth century, let yourself be seduced by our garden patio, a pleasurable experience on sunny days, our cozy breakfast room, and the relaxing atmosphere of our lobby. After the warm welcome by our professional team, always at your disposal, you will appreciate the comfort of our rooms decorated in an elegant and timeless design. A convenient location , caring personnel and warm atmosphere make Malta Hotel the perfect place for your stay in the capital, whether traveling with family or on your own.

name: Hôtel Regina Louvre
description: The prestigious Regina Hotel, fully renovated, belongs to a long French tradition of luxury hotels. In the heart of the trendy district which is home to fashion design, shopping and museum, Paris aficionados will find the ideal place to stay, across the Louvre museum and the Tuileries Garden. Thanks to its wonderful situation, the capital's major attractions are just a stone's throw away including the Palais Royal and the Champs Elysees. From here, the luxurious Place Vendome, Orsay museum and the shopping centre Les Halles can be reached within 15 minutes on foot. Furthermore, the 'Tuileries' and 'Pyramides' metro stop at 150 meters provide quick and easy access throughout the city. First opened in 1900 for the World's Fair, Hotel Regina welcomes you in an intimate, spacious, sophisticated haven, where fine woodwork and designer lighting reinforce its anchor in Paris' history. This fully air conditioned property offers an array of services including a 24h reception, concierge, room service, laundry and limousine service amongst other. Furthermore, complimentary wireless Internet is accessible throughout the property. Each of the 99 rooms at the Regina Hotel in Paris has been elegantly furnished with antiques and period furniture, creating a traditional and luminous decor. Modern in-room amenities include a safe, direct dial telephone and flat screen television with satellite channels. Some of the bedrooms offer breath-taking views of the Louvre museum, the Tuileries Garden and the Eiffel Tower. Let yourself be charmed by its pretty Patio (opened on sunny days) and its staff dedicated to your personal needs. In its British atmosphere of the hotel bar, you will enjoy a drink or a cocktail from our Chef Barman. You will have also the opportunity to relish pastries from our pastry chef and our selection of teas. For lunch and dinner the Hotel Regina Restaurant will propose you a French and seasonal cuisine.

name: Hotel L'Arbre Voyageur, BW Premier Collection
description: The 4 Star luxury Hotel l'Arbre Voyageur, BW Premier Collection® is the new address downtown. Ideally located in the heart of Lille, it is less than 300 meters from the Grand Place and 500 meters from Lille Flandres and Lille Europe stations or the metro. In this new jewel of 48 rooms including 3 Suites, this former Consulate Lille is an invitation to travel, with its luxurious rooms and its unique decoration. We cultivate the difference, and every room is unique. With two restaurants and a bakery with a gift shop, we will welcome you around our patio with a florist and a wine cellar too. Aware of the many environmental issues, everything has been created here for comfort and sustainable development. Fully air-conditioned and equipped with high speed Wi-Fi, and through our solar panels, we minimize our carbon footprint. We have the desire to create a place of encounter and exchange, where responsible enjoy every day experiences is a currency. Cultivate the difference, for unforgettable moments of life. We rely on the talent of our teams to rhyme enthusiasm with professionalism and care with generosity; share the best addresses, it is our job and we do it with passion for your pleasure.

name: Hotel 96
description: Excellent choix pour les voyageurs visitant Marseille, l'Hotel 96 offre un cadre romantique et de nombreux services conçus pour sublimer votre séjour. Le wi-fi gratuit est offert aux clients et les chambres de l'Hotel 96 sont dotées d'une télévision à écran plat et d'une climatisation. Pendant votre séjour, vous pourrez profiter des services de l'hôtel, dont la conciergerie, le mobilier d'extérieur et la boutique de souvenirs. Les clients de l'Hotel 96 sont également invités à utiliser une piscine et un salon de l'hôtel. Un parking gratuit est à la disposition des voyageurs véhiculés. Situé non loin de monuments tels que Cité Radieuse Le Corbusier (2,5 km) et MArseille MOdulor (2,5 km), l'Hotel 96 jouit d'une localisation parfaite pour découvrir les différentes attractions de Marseille. Envie de déguster des restaurants de poissons et fruits de mer? Allez dans un des restaurants alentours tels que Chez Aldo, Au Bord De L'Eau ou Pierrot Coquillages. Marseille est également connu pour ses célèbres sites historiques, dont Château d'If, Palais Longchamp et Palais du Pharo, qui sont tout près de l'Hotel 96. Profitez bien de votre séjour à Marseille!

name: Hôtel La Bourdonnais by Inwood Hotels
description: See why so many travelers make Hotel La Bourdonnais their hotel of choice when visiting Paris. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

name: Hotel Le Nouveau Monde
description: It is located close to beaches and shops and offers 83 rooms, from the classic room to the Deluxe Suite. The rooms have a trendy decoration with noble materials, a contemporary design and a soft and warm atmosphere. The hotel also has a restaurant with an exceptional panorama of the bay. The hotel's spa offers a range of treatments, an underwater pool and a swim lane. Finally, the hotel offers several meeting rooms for seminars and conferences.

name: Hôtel Adèle & Jules
description: Located in a quiet alley of the trendy 9th arrondissement of Paris, hotel Adèle & Jules is a newly opened hotel, with a very chic Parisian style. It offers all services you would expect such as free high speed wi-fi, 24 hr reception with full concierge service, as well as an Honesty Bar, room service, a business corner, a fitness and a meeting room for up to 18 guests. Hotel Adèle & Jules offers 4 categories of rooms: The Superior Parisienne, the Deluxe Faubourg, the Club Boulevard, as well as 2 Suites Capitale. All rooms come with 1 double bed (Queen size 160 or King size 180) or twin beds (2x80 or 2x90). They are all equipped with 40' flat screen TV with satellite channels, Air conditioning, individual safe which can accommodate a laptop, bathrooms with Shower or Bath, Fragonnard amenities, bathrobes, hair-dryer. In our Deluxe, Club and Suite categories, guest can enjoy a Nespresso machine as well as tea facilities. Upon arrival guests can relax and refresh with complimentary mineral water. The hotel offers a complimentary High tea every day from 4 to 6 PM in the lounge area. Continental buffet Breakfast is served from 7h to 11h, or it can also be ordered in room. Thanks to its exclusive location in a private alley and with the addition of sound proof walls, guests can enjoy total silence in all rooms categories, although the neighbourhood raves with restaurant, cafés and bars as well as theatres. The hotel front desk team will be happy to take care of all your needs: restaurant bookings, cultural activities, shopping tips, bicycle rental, transportation including transfer to and from the main airports. Luggage service is free and available at all times.

name: La Chambre du Marais
description: A short walk from the rue des Francs-Bourgeois and the best addresses of the fashionable Marais district, discover a town house combining timeless elegance and luxurious facilities. Located in the 3rd arrondissement of Paris, La Chambre du Marais, with its stylish and comfortable design by Philippe Jégou, is an exceptional Parisian hotel.

name: Aparthotel AMMI Nice Massena
description: The Aparthotel AMMI Nice Massena (ex Ajoupa) is located right by the Place Massena, the Albert 1st Gardens and only a 3 minutes walk from the sea and the famous Promenade des Anglais. In the heart of the city you will find all means of transport (tram, bus, train) as well as many restaurants and shops nearby. All studios and apartments are equipped with kitchenette (fully equipped), private bathroom, individual air conditioning and double glazing.

name: Hotel de Provence
description: The Hotel de Provence is a small charming family hotel with 30 rooms, located in the city center of Cannes, close to the beaches and the shopping streets, we strongly advise you to choose our rooms with a view of the garden, We are located 7 minutes walk from the train station or the Palais des Festivals we also offer studios and a beautiful apartment 100 m from the hotel, cleaning is done there every day, We are already looking forward to welcoming you soon to help you discover the charm of Provence.

name: Hotel Eiffel Turenne
description: At a short walk to the Military Academy Square and the Invalides, discover the big charm of a cozy hotel exceptionally located in Paris.Close to the Eiffel Tower as well as to all the renowned places of the Rive Gauche, in a charming characteristic area, the hotel de Turenne Paris VII allows you to relax and enjoy a complete comfort all along your stays in Paris.During the week-end, for a trip or a work meeting, our 34 rooms grant you relax and a cozy atmosphere as well as a large panel of services :- Free secure WiFi- Air-Conditioned

name: Hôtel Le Derby Alma By Inwood Hotels
description: Discover the charm of Derby Alma, your romantic oasis in the heart of Paris. Ideally located, this hotel immerses you in elegance and comfort with rooms equipped with flat-screen TV, air conditioning, and minibar, not to mention free Wi-Fi to keep you connected. Just steps away from the city's treasures, such as the Louvre Museum and Notre-Dame Cathedral, Derby Alma is the perfect place to explore Paris.

name: Hôtel De Buci
description: An air of the 18th century lingers over the Latin Quarter in the heart of Saint-Germain-des-Pres... And a address at the refined, intimate Hotel de Buci. This 4-star boutique hotel took its inspiration from the great traditions of the Enlightenment. Bringing a modern touch to the boudoir, that great invention of the Louis XV period, this charming hotel on the Rue de Buci, with its 24 quintessentially Parisian rooms and suites, offers the unparalleled experience of a journey back in time. Centrally located in the centre of historic Saint-Germain-des-Pres, the hotel puts you right on the doorstep of all the leading art galleries, not to mention all the top luxury boutiques. Across the way from a typical street market, enjoy all the comfort of a luxury French hotel in central Paris as you experience the vibrant life of the Quartier Saint Germain des Pres and the whole of the left bank.

name: Hotel Relais Bosquet By Malone
description: Découvrez pourquoi l'Hotel Relais Bosquet est l'hôtel préféré des voyageurs visitant Paris. Mélange idéal entre rapport qualité/prix et confort, il offre un cadre romantique avec une gamme de services conçus pour les voyageurs comme vous. Le Relais Bosquet est un hôtel romantique proposant des chambres équipées d'une télévision à écran plat, d'une climatisation et d'un minibar. Vous pouvez également compter sur un wi-fi gratuit pour rester connecté tout au long de votre séjour. L'hôtel dispose d'une réception ouverte 24 heures sur 24, d'une conciergerie. Le petit déjeuner n'est pas étranger à sa grande popularité auprès des voyageurs visitant Paris. Situé à proximité des monuments les plus célèbres de Paris, comme Arc de Triomphe (2,1 km) et Musée du Louvre (2,3 km), l'Hotel Relais Bosquet est une destination idéale pour les touristes. Nous sommes sûrs que vous apprécierez votre séjour à l'Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris et que vous pourrez profiter de tout ce que Paris a à offrir.

name: Hotel Gustave
description: In a typical Parisian building from the 19th century, Le Gustave is located close to Eiffel Tower. You will enjoy calm and quietness in Gustave’s elegant lobby Rooms have been decorated according to Paris Universal Exhibition back in 1900. Rooms are soundproof; enjoy satellite TV, air conditioning, welcome tray and a minibar. A buffet breakfast is served daily. It can be served in your room on demand. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel Le Gustave. In Gustave rooms, guests can listen to their favorite songs thanks to the Wall Speaker with Bluetooth. Those rooms propose a view on Eiffel Tower. Le Gustave is 0,12 miles from Dupleix metro station, providing direct access to the Champ de Mars, Champs Elysees, Montparnasse. 15th arr. is a great choice for travelers interested in romantic, sightseeing and shopping.

name: B Montmartre Hotel
description: Close to the famous Moulin Rouge cabaret, the Beauséjour Montmartre has 36 air-conditioned rooms, accommodating 1 to 4 people, with free wireless internet access. The hotel has a wine bar « Le Discret » opening onto an internal garden, offering a refreshing area of greenery.15 minutes by metro from the Champs Elysées and 15 minutes' walk from Saint Lazare railway station, the hotel Beauséjour Montmartre is located in the North-West of Paris, in a quiet side street bordering the Batignolles quarter, with direct access to the Stade de France, via line 13 of the metro.Formerly a family guest house, founded in 1855, this three star hotel, completely renovated in 2011/2012 blends tradition with modernity. Open 24 hours a day, this elegant and discreet hotel is a real haven of peace and quiet in the heart of Paris.

name: Hotel Britannique
description: The Hotel Britannique in its present location, dates from 1860, in an impressive building built in the time of Napoleon III. The cosy and lush decoration of the hotel recalls the 19th century English and French styles. Being recently renovated, the hotel offers an old world style with all the comforts of modern times. All 39 of the hotel's rooms have a private ensuite bathroom, international television, high-speed wi-fi access, a courtesy tray, a minibar, a bathrobe, luxury welcome products....The reception is also there to generously welcome you 24/7 and to make sure that your Parisian stay is a success.

name: Hotel Hannong
description: Downtown hotel with neoclassical facade, situated 100 meters from the Petite France area & 300 meters from the Cathedral.

name: Secret de Paris - Hotel & Spa
description: Niché en plein Paris, dans le quartier Trinité, à quelques minutes à pied des Grands Magasins, le Secret de Paris - Hotel & Spa vous plonge dans un rêve éveillé en plein cœur de la Ville Lumière. Écrin d’un Paris unique et onirique, cet hôtel design, luxueux et attentionné, offre, le temps d’une nuit, le prolongement idéal de la ville de Paris et de sa magie. Dans l’intimité de votre chambre, vous devenez soudain l’hôte privilégié des plus prestigieux monuments de Paris, délicatement suggérés par une mise en scène design, délicate et subtile. Rêver au premier étage de la Tour Eiffel? S’assoupir sous l’horloge du Musée d’Orsay? S’aimer au Moulin Rouge? S’émouvoir à Opéra de Paris?

name: Hôtel Henriette
description: Welcome to the boutique hotel Hotel Henriette Rive Gauche. Situated in a small and quiet street close to the Mouffetard district, the Hotel Henriette offers a truly unique and intimate experience. Our thirty-two individually designed bedrooms provide a constantly unfolding and fresh source of delight for our guests. #Emotion. Hotel Henriette offers a lounge with a wide selection of reading matter, an appealing vintage winter garden, a delicious breakfast served daily and a #conciergerie service offering a friendly helping hand with your arrangements for travel, excursions, restaurants bookings, theatre tickets and anything else that will help you to enjoy your days and nights in Paris.. #ILoveParis

name: Hôtel Bradford Elysées - Astotel
description: Located in an exceptional area between the Champs-Elysees and Faubourg St-Honore, discover the charm of a authentic Haussman-style hotel. Surrounded by the portraits of the Bradford family, presented in a universe of soft and warm silks, let yourself be seduced by the refined, bright and delicate interior of Bradford Elysees. All rooms are serviced by a magnificient historical lift. All rooms are air conditioned and decorated in classic, elegant colors. Some of our 50 rooms feature house chimneys, remnants of the Haussmann period, whereas others provide balconies for a true Parisian stay Of course, we do not forget the modern touch: All rooms are well equipped with an iPod docking station, cable TV and a minibar. Delicious, varied, and generous breakfast buffet, served each morning under the sumptuous canopy of the bright dining room. Don't forget that you can also enjoy breakfast in the privacy of your room. Whether travelling with your family or on your own, the charm of our hotel, a safe shelter from the bustle albeit a few steps away from the most beautiful avenue in the world, will no doubt bewitch you.

name: Hôtel Square Louvois
description: Its location in the heart of Paris’ 2nd arrondissement, minutes from the Louvre, Jardin des Tuileries, Palais-Royal, Opera and banks of the Seine, make it the perfect place to soak up the best of the French capital. Whether it’s a business trip, romantic break or weekend away with friends, experience the beautiful spa and the quality of innovative services.

name: Hôtel Monsieur Aristide
description: L'Hôtel Monsieur Aristide, boutique hôtel 4 étoiles, est situé au détour de l’une des petites rues pavées de la Butte Montmartre. Un immeuble du XIXème siècle accueille 25 chambres et suites autour d’un jardin secret. Maison ouverte et singulière, les pièces de mobilier ont pour l’essentiel été chinés dans des brocantes d’ici ou d’ailleurs. C’est aussi un restaurant proposant une cuisine authentique autour de produits de saison, un bar à cocktail musical, une terrasse méditerranéenne et un jardin sous les étoiles.

name: Sultan Cave Suites
description: Eğer Göreme'de büyüleyici otel arıyorsanız, Sultan Cave Suites tam size göre.

name: Artemis Cave Suites
description: Tatil fikrinin klasik beklentilerini altüst eden, sadece eğlence ve dinlence değil aynı zamanda bir kültür ve birikim yağmuruna tutulacağınız masal gibi Kapadokya günleri için doğru adrestesiniz. 21.yüzyılın konfor ve lüksünü, sizi çağlar öncesine taşıyan mağara içi oyma odalarda bulacak ve belki de hiç dışarı çıkmak istemeyeceksiniz. Elbette otelimizin eşsiz konumu itibarıyla dışarı da göz atmanızı tavsiye ederiz. Kızılırmak'a güneyden açılan Göreme, Nevşehir-Ürgüp-Avanos üçgeni arasındaki etrafı vadilerle çevrili ve doğanın incelikle işlediği nakış gibi bir bölgede yer alır. Otelimiz ise Kapadokya bölgesinin incisi olan Göreme'de yer almakla kalmayıp aynı zamanda Göreme'nin en görkemli noktası olan Aydın Kırağı ya da diğer adıyla Aşıklar Tepesi'nin hemen etekleri altında, tarih kokan romantik bir sokakta bulunmaktadır. Terasımızda keyif kahvenizi yudumlarken, etrafı vadilerle çevrili ve Peribacalarının en yoğun şekilde konumlandığı bu dünya kasabasını tepeden izleyerek görsel bir şölen yaşayacaksınız. Kültür ve tarihin, yağmur ve rüzgarın birlikte yazdığı bu peri masalını okumanız, anlamanız, yaşamanız ve anlatmanız için sizleri buraya bekliyoruz.

name: The Story Hotel Pera
description: Adını, Beyoğlu’nun en bilindik sokaklarından biri olan Kumbaracı Yokuşu’ndan alan bina; ortalama 23 -61 m²’lik 24 oda ve giriş katında bulunan şömineli bir bar & restoran & bistrodan oluşuyor. Tarihi cephesi ile İstiklal Caddesi’nde yürümekte olan insanların bile dikkatini çekecek güzellikteki bina, kültür mirasımızın olduğu kadar, birbirinden renkli cafe&restoranlarla eğlencenin de merkezi haline gelen Asmalı Mescit’te bulunuyor.Zamana yenik düşmekten hoşlanmayan ve unutulmamak için daima çabalayan tarihi Pera'nın en gözde mekanı ve Beyoğlu’nun en bilindik mahallesi olan Asmalı Mescit gece kulüpleri ve barları ile de eğlenmeyi seven herkesin buluşma noktası. Buradaki tarihi doku bugünün modern çizgileri ile restore edilerek küçük otellere, yeme-içme ve eğlence alanlarına çevrilmiş durumda. Böylece İstanbul gece hayatının kalbi, Beyoğlu’nun aynası Asmalımescit bir yandan eğlendirirken, bir yandan da kültür mirasını en ince hatlarıyla ortaya koyuyor.Bahsedilen bu lokasyona en şık şekilde yakışması planlanan Stories Hotel Kumbaracı’nın 1900’lerin başına ait binası da, Beyoğlu’nun mimari dokusunun büyük kısmını oluşturan Fransız mimarisine hakim olup tipik özelliklerini taşıyor. Geniş suite odalar yaratmak için üzerinde en mantıklı şekilde çalışılan binayı, işlevselliği maksimumda tutacak şekilde dekore etmek üzere bir çalışma sürdürülmüş ve başarıya ulaşılmıştır.Stories Hotel Kumbaracı, yüksek tavanları, geniş geçişleri, dönen mermer merdiveni ve giriş katındaki barı ile, tarihi günümüz modernizmi ile buluşturuyor.

name: Sirkeci Mansion
description: Sirkeci Mansion, İstanbul seyahati yapan gezginler için harika bir seçim. Otel, konaklamanızı daha konforlu kılan birçok tesis olanağının yanı sıra aileler için uygun bir ortam da sunuyor.

name: Hotel Yasmak Sultan
description: İstanbul'da aileler için uygun otel bulmak ille de zor olacak değil. Sizin gibi gezginler için harika bir seçenek olan Yaşmak Sultan Hotel'e hoşgeldiniz.

name: Neorion Hotel
description: Neorion Otel'e hoş geldiniz! İstanbul'da sizin için ikinci bir yuva olma arzusundaki bu otel, konaklamanızı daha keyifli kılmak üzere birçok farklı tesis olanağı sunuyor.

name: Aydinli Cave Hotel
description: Aydınlı Cave Hotel'e hoş geldiniz! Göreme'de sizin için ikinci bir yuva olma arzusundaki bu otel, konaklamanızı daha keyifli kılmak üzere birçok farklı tesis olanağı sunuyor.

name: Swissotel The Bosphorus, Istanbul
description: İstanbul'da tam da size göre bir son moda oteli bulmak ille de zor olacak değil. Sizin gibi gezginler için harika bir seçim olan Swissotel The Bosphorus'a hoş geldiniz!

name: Demiray Hotel Old City
description: Demiray Hotel Istanbul'a Hoş geldiniz, lüks ve konforun tarihi Sultanahmet bölgesinin kalbinde buluştuğu yer. Zevkle dekore edilmiş ve özenle tasarlanmış odalarımız, İstanbul'un büyüleyici güzelliklerini keşfettikten sonra mükemmel bir dinlenme alanı sunar. Ayasofya, Sultanahmet Camii, Kapalıçarşı ve Mısır Çarşısı gibi sembolik yerlere sadece bir taş atımı uzaklıkta konumlanan otelimiz, şehrin zengin kültürel mirasına eşsiz erişim imkanı sunar. Haliç, Pera Bölgesi, Boğaz, Topkapı Sarayı ve Aya Sofya'nın güzelliğini tek bir çerçevede mükemmel şekilde sunan panoramik manzaralar eşliğinde sunulan zengin açık büfe kahvaltımızla gününüze doğru başlayın. Muhteşem manzaralar duyularınızı canlandırsın ve sizi bekleyen maceralara ilham versin.

name: Rixos  Premium Belek - The Land Of Legends Access
description: Yorucu bir günden sonra herkes başını koyacak bir yastık arar. Belek otellerinden Rixos Premium Belek, dinlenmek ve zindelik kazanmak için çok uygun bir seçenek. Aileler için uygun ortamıyla ve harika restoranlarıyla bilinen Rixos Premium Belek, konuklarına Belek'in tadını çıkarmada kolaylık sağlıyor.

name: Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center
description: İstanbul seyahatine çıkanlar için Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center harika bir seçim. Bütçeye uygunluğu, konforu ve elverişli konumuyla bu otel, son moda bir ortam ve tam da sizin gibi gezginler için düşünülmüş tesis olanakları sunuyor. İstanbul'un ünlü gezilecek yerlerinden Taksim Meydanı'na (2, 4 km) ve Miniatürk'e (2, 5 km) yakınlığı sayesinde Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center'de kalan konuklar buraları kolayca gezebilir. Son moda otel arayanlara Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center iyi bir seçenek. Odalarında düz ekran televizyon, buzdolabı ve klima sunan işletme, konuklarına ayrıca ücretsiz wifi da sağlıyor. Otelde oda servisi, concierge ve çatı terası hizmetleri mevcut. Ayrıca konuklar havuz ve kahvaltı gibi olanaklardan yararlanabilir. İşletme bu sayede İstanbul seyahatine çıkanlar için gözde bir seçim. Aracıyla gelen konuklar için otopark hizmeti mevcut. Eğer canınız karides çekiyorsa, Ulus 29, Karakoy Lokantasi veya Meze By Lemon Tree sizin için iyi seçenekler. Yoksa, Scalatta, Zucca Pizza & Cafe veya Vegan İstanbul gibi İtalyan restoranı restoranlarına bakabilirsiniz. Yapılacak bir şey arıyorsanız, Sultanahmet Meydanı'na, Çemberlitaş Sütunu'na ve Statue of Atatürk & Children'e uğrayarak güzel vakit geçirebilirsiniz. Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center için konuklarının konfor ve memnuniyeti her zaman önde geliyor. Otel, İstanbul seyahatinizde sizi karşılamaktan mutluluk duyacak.

name: White House Hotel Istanbul
description: White House Hotel Istanbul, İstanbul seyahati yapan gezginler için harika bir seçim. Otel, konaklamanızı daha konforlu kılan birçok tesis olanağının yanı sıra romantik bir ortam da sunuyor.

name: Megasaray Westbeach Antalya
description: Büyüleyici lokasyon, etkileyici hizmet anlayışı. Tesisimizde 24 saat Ultra Her Şey Dahil konsept dahilinde mega lezzetler ile buluşacak, üst segment içecekler ile keyif alacaksınız. 334 odası bulunan tesiste, Deniz manzaralı veya Toros Dağları Manzaralı odalarımızda konforu yaşayacak, Suite odalarımızda lüks ve huzurun mükemmel birlikteliğine şahit olacaksınız. Doruklarda yaşatılacak eğlence konseptimiz ile mutlu anılarınıza artı katacaksınız. Ultra Her Şey dahil konsepti ile uluslararası yemeklerin servis edildiği ana restaurantın yanısıra, La Prima İtalyan ve Lagos balık A’la Carte restaurantları ile Dünya mutfakları lezzetlerinin keyfini çıkarabilirsiniz. Panoramik Akdeniz manzarasının keyfini Megasaray kalitesi ile yaşayabileceğiniz tesisimiz farklı konseptlere sahip toplantı salonları ile birlikte günü birlik veya konaklamalı iş gezileri için de misafirlerine yanıt veriyor. Megasaray WestBeach Antalya olarak, tüm bu güzellikleri sizlere yaşatmak için sabırsızlanıyoruz.

name: Hotel Sultania
description: İstanbul'da tam da size göre bir son moda oteli bulmak ille de zor olacak değil. Sizin gibi gezginler için harika bir seçim olan Hotel Sultania'ya hoş geldiniz!

name: Concorde De Luxe Resort
description: Antalya’nın doğal güzellikleriyle ve mavi bayraklı kumdan plajlarıyla ünlü Lara bölgesinde, denize sıfır konumda bulunan Concorde De Luxe Resort, adını ve konseptini Concorde uçaklarından alan tematik bir oteldir. Farklı, modern iç ve dış mimarisiyle konforlu bir tatil deneyimi sunan Concorde De Luxe Resort, Antalya Havalimanına 10km, şehir merkezine ise 15km uzaklıkta olup Belek golf sahaları, temalı parklar, akvaryum gibi spor ve eğlence alanlarının yanı sıra Kaleiçi, Perge, Aspendos gibi tarihi ve turistik merkezlere de kolayca ulaşabileceğiniz bir konumdadır. Deniz ve kumsalın yanı sıra tarih ve kültürle de zenginleşen dopdolu bir tatil fırsatını Concorde De Luxe Resort ile yakalayın!

name: Divan Cave Hotel
description: Divan Cave House Hotel'e hoş geldiniz! Göreme'de sizin için ikinci bir yuva olma arzusundaki bu otel, konaklamanızı daha keyifli kılmak üzere birçok farklı tesis olanağı sunuyor.

name: Romance Istanbul Hotel
description: İstanbul seyahatine çıkanlar için Romance Istanbul Hotel harika bir seçim. Otel, son moda bir ortamın yanı sıra, konaklamanızı daha keyifli kılacak birçok pratik tesis olanağı sunuyor.

name: Bill & Coo Suites Lounge
description: Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Mykonos Town, offering a luxury environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

name: Apollon Hotel
description: Apollon Hotel combining a friendly, modern and relaxed space that helps create an ideal atmosphere to experience the best Tolo has to offer. Apollon Hotel's rooms and suites are newly renovated and all are equipped with flat screen satellite TV, a refrigerator, safe box, air conditioning and balcony providing exceptional comfort and convenience. Wifi is available throughout the property and pool area as well. A 24 hour front desk, restaurant, concierge and airport transfers are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool, pool bar and buffet breakfast will also help to make your stay even more comfortable. If you are driving to the Apollon, free private parking is available. During your visit, be sure to check out Agia Kyriaki Church (0.5 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel. We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Apollon Hotel as you experience everything Tolon has to offer.

name: Psaravolada Milos Resort
description: Psaravolada Resort is located on the south side of Milos, very close to Aghia Kyriaki beach which is one of the best sandy beaches of the island and just on top of the magnificent beach of Psaravolada from which the hotel owes its name. Covering a panoramic area of approximately 30,000m2 Psaravolada Resort is created, with love and respect to the environment. Our rooms & suites provide total relaxation and promise a pleasant stay in a beautiful, cozy and friendly environment with magnificent views to the Cycladic endless blue, full of colors from sunset to sunrise. A complex of 12 newly-build traditional rooms and suites that are connected via cobbled paths. Small stone-build fences create a unique scenery resembling to a castle travelling guest in time… In this dreamy resort indulge yourself in the most mouth-watering culinary journeys at our Psaravolada Restaurant. All guests and visitors are welcome to explore the authentic world of gastronomy at this eclectic restaurant with breathtaking views, enjoying flavors and aromas of traditional and international cuisine.

name: Albatros Club Mykonos
description: Albatros Club Mykonos is located in the northern part of Mykonos at the Panormos beach one of the most inviting destinations of Mykonos island Greece.

name: Lindos Comfy Suites
description: All 20 rooms at Lindos Comfy Suites have been fully renovated in 2016, following our main principle of style in comfort. Our goal is to make sure that our guests experience an elegant and relaxing ambience inside, while enjoying the magnificent nature and outstanding view outside. Rich in colours, the green and silver of the olive trees, the ancient rock hill, the infinite blue of the Aegean and scents both from land and sea, the beauty of the landscape surrounding Lindos Comfy Suites is complimented and further highlighted in all of our rooms.

name: Onar Villas
description: Experience the authentic cave room experience, combined with traditional hospitality of Santorini and its unique moments of relaxation. Let your eyes wander around the unique view of the caldera, the volcano, the surrounding vast Aegean blue waters and the world famous sunsets. A one of a kind experience for every visitor.

name: Alkyon Hotel Skiathos
description: Alkyon hotel is located on the beautiful and cosmopolitan Skiathos island. Harmoniously integrated with the natural environment, built next to the sea and resting by the enchanting natural port of the island. Uniquely located next to the calm waters of the port, at aprox. 250m from the village center, offering magnificent views of the sea, the main port, marina with yachts and the historic Bourtzi. Facing the whitewashed houses with cobblestone streets, the traditional windmill, the olive groves, and the pine forest opposite. The hotel today is a reference point for Skiathos and is considered one of the historic hotels on the island. It has left its mark over time; its history is almost equal to the tourist development of the Island. The hotel is located next to the port and just 2 km from the Airport. Easy transport access to Skiathos, with daily connections by air to the largest cities, in Greece and Europe and by ferry or speed boat from Mantoudi, Agios Konstantinos and Volos. Frequent buses depart to and from the terminal, which is close to the hotel, making island exploration easy, the beaches of Skiathos are renowned for their natural beauty, with over 60 accessible, Mandraki, Maratha, Agia Eleni and Megali Ammos being closest to the hotel just to name few. A variety ranging from long stretches, to small, secluded coves, dramatic cliff edged beaches reachable only by boat, all unspoiled, awash with character, constitute a memorable summer holiday. The location of the hotel is ideal for those who want to get to know and experience the cosmopolitan nightlife of Skiathos, but also a variety of places of interest, that capture the history of yesterday and the trends of today. SERVICES • Reception 24 hours • Concierge service-Information • Daily room cleaning • Laundry service • Room service • Safe deposit box • Reservation for à la carte or set Menu • Organization of excursions • Car rental • Event organization ROOM FEATURES • Room 22m2 • Double or twin bed • Wardrobe • Comfortable bathroom with hairdryer • Complete set of amenities (shampoo, shower gel, cap, towel set) • Autonomous air conditioning • Refrigerator or minibar • TV • Telephone • Balcony with chairs and table PUBLIC HOTEL AREAS • Reception • Living room • Outdoor Swimming Pool • Indoor Bar • Main restaurant • Living room-rest area • Roof Garden-outdoor serving area • Free parking • Free access to Wi-Fi • Carnayo restaurant

name: Irides
description: Irides studios & apartments are located right on the beach, just outside the village of Souvala in Agious on the north side of Aegina island (vis a vis Athens) in Greece. You can wake up with the sound of the waves. Have your breakfast at our poolside and enjoy the sun & sea afterwards. There are sunbeds around the pool and on the beach in front. Our studios & apartments and our family bungalow are comfortable and have balconies or terraces with view towards the sea.

name: Petousis Hotel & Suites
description: “PETOUSIS HOTEL & SUITES” is located in Ammoudara, the beach front premises of Heraklion city which makes it the perfect destination for travelers seeking the relaxation of the sea and the proximity to a vibrant city life. The hotel is located in walking distance from the long sandy beach of Ammoudara with shops, cafeterias, restaurants surrounding it.

name: Santellini Hotel
description: The Santellini hotel is a charming 26 bedroom hotel nestling in the heart of Kamari, one of the most popular and longest beaches in Santorini. Ideally located in a central but quiet and private part of Kamari, it is conveniently close to shops, restaurants, bars, a pharmacy, cash machines, other hotels, bus stations and is only a few steps from the beach.The hotel was built in 2003 in a traditional Santorinian style, has been completely renovated for 2015 and offers a variety of accommodation (double, single, triple/superior, maisonettes, honeymoon maisonette).

name: Keramos
description: Hotel Keramos is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Zaros, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.

name: Blue Waves Hotel
description: Blue Waves hotel is located only 30meters from Kamara beach. One of the most famous beaches in Santorini. Blue Waves hotel is a traditional hotel that combines the Greek atmosphere with a modern lifestyle. The recently renovated Blue Waves has a spacious and inviting terrace and pool where guests can relax, as the bar serves a wide variety of drinks and small snacks to keep you refreshed throughout the day. If you are looking to relax, unwind and enjoy the beauty of your surroundings, the Blue Waves is the ideal place.

name: Bella Vista Hotel & Studios
description: Bella Vista Hotel and Studios is a warm, friendly, family, bed and breakfast hotel located at Benitses beach just 12 kms from Corfu Town centre. Facilities include: Free Internet access, Air Condition (free), TV, Fridge, En-suite bathroom (shower), balcony, kitchenette (upon request), swimming pool (50 meters distance) and free car parking (150 meters). Home-made Greek breakfast buffet style available.

name: Emporios Bay Hotel
description: A family run hotel which is certainly going to attract you with its peaceful atmosphere, its warm hospitality and its simplicity which is harmonically combined with quality in every detail. Emporios Bay is situated in mastic-village area at the small bay of Emporios and just a few metres away from the most well-known beach of the island called “Mavra Volia” (Black pebble Beach) Structured with a lot of love and passion in perfect harmony with its natural environment, we offer our services giving importance and priority to cleanliness, pleasure, comfort, convenience and relaxation to our guests. The unbeatable natural beauty of the local area with its charming landscape variations, its wild and uniquely wonderful beaches, the medieval mastichochoria(mastic villages) , the pure hospitality of locals all create an idyllic holiday atmosphere. We are looking forward to welcoming you

name: Serenissima Boutique Hotel
description: Serenissima Boutique Hotel offers our guests a serene and luxurious environment in the heart of the Old City of Chania within walking distance to all of the major attractions. Situated in a traditional 15th century Venetian townhouse, the hotel is designed in the minimalist style,elegantly marrying the ancient and the modern. The building itself is a testament to the history of Crete.

name: La Luna Hotel
description: Just next to the shores of an Aegean Island famous for its vivid and green atmosphere, lies La Luna hotel, tucked into a wooded hill above the soothing beach of Troulos. In our hotel you will find airy and comfortable rooms which can create an idyllic and romantic atmosphere to a couple while a cozy and pleasant experience to a family. All rooms provide balcony or terrace with view to the Aegean Sea that will make you forget the urban monotony the minute you walk through the door. As a family-run hotel, we are working like a determined team, ready to create for you a pleasant and memorable holiday experience.

name: Andromeda Hotel Apartments
description: Στον αυλόγυρο της πόλης της Κω αγναντεύοντας το γαλάζιο του Αιγαίου βρίσκεται η οικογενειακή ξενοδοχειακή μονάδα ‘Ανδρομέδα’. Πολυτελές, φινετσάτο, άνετο και με ζεστό περιβάλλον το συγκρότημα μας ενσωματώνει όλες τις σύγχρονες ανέσεις. Ένας μικρός παράδεισος που ξεχωρίζει μέσα από το όμορο φυσικό τοπίο και έχει θέα τις μικρασιατικές ακτές που προβάλλονται στην απέναντι ακτογραμμή. Στα κομψά διακοσμημένα και ευρύχωρα δωμάτιά του το μεσογειακό αεράκι θα στείλει την διάθεσή σας στο υψηλότερο επίπεδο. Συνεχώς προσπαθούμε για την τελειότητα σε ότι προσφέρουμε στους καλεσμένους μας. Για την επίτευξη αυτού του στόχου τα μέλη της οικογένειας μας είναι πάντα πρόθυμα να σας εξυπηρετήσουν. Ανυπομονούμε να σας γνωρίσουμε και να γίνει η διαμονή σας η ευκαιρία να μπείτε στην παρέα των φανατικών μας φίλων.

name: Ostria Inn
description: Ostria Inn beach hotel is ideally located for all those travelers wanting to discover the secret, unspoiled side of the island of Naxos. The crystal clear waters, fresh sea air, outstanding views and unsurpassed romantic sunrises make for the most revitalising of experiences. Prepare yourself for a gastronomical love affair, as you savour exceptional local dishes at one of the best, most well-renowned, restaurants of Naxos Island. We offer our guests a personal and direct experience of the unparalleled natural beauty of Naxos, steeped in the authentic character of Greek culture. With all the local knowledge you could hope for, we are able to guide you in making your holiday an unforgettable experience of everything of the best that Naxos has to offer, from ancient sites to traditional villages to the most secluded beaches and much more.

name: Platanista Hotel
description: Designed to recreate the look of a castle, the family-run Platanista consistently wins awards for its high standards, excellent value for money & caring staff. This impressive hotel is in a quiet position only 200m from the beach, 2km from Kos town, & 1km from the marina. A simple, yet aesthetic, environment worked out to accommodate the visitors who would want to experience something exceptional from the ordinary. A thousand and one nights in Greece...

name: Pension George
description: If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Karterádhos, look no further than Pension George. Pension George offers guests an array of room amenities including a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and a kitchenette, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available. The hotel offers a picnic area, outdoor furniture, and a sun terrace, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool. During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Karterádhos shrimp restaurant such as Taverna - Skaramagas, which is a short distance from Pension George. The staff at Pension George looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: Island Blue Hotel
description: Welcome to a world of Sun kissed days and deep blue Seas...Enjoy the fabled Greek hospitality...Welcome to our World...Spread over a 12000m2 area, this newly built (2009) complex has 34 self catering apartments & 52 guestrooms. Modern in design , the complex is adjacent to Pefki Islands Resort.Two expansive pools with separate children’s swimming pools & free sun beds are available, along with pool bar, billiards, game room, playground, snack bar, restaurant & a nearby super market.A brand new restaurant and Lounge Bar named ELIA is now open on our new complex ISLAND BLUE HOTEL. It is open for Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner.You can make reservations or arrangements for all your special occasions at reception.

name: Eltina Apartments
description: 21 Studios and apartments from 1 to 4 persons, 2 swimming pools, 2 snack bars (one 24hours open), sun terrace , sun beds, reception, free wifi in public areas, Wi- Fi in all rooms and places of Hotel*, Internet corner *,full kitchen in rooms , a/c*,fan*, safe box*, late check out*, shower curtains, hair dryer(* extra charge, paid locally ).

name: Villa Margarita Mykonos
description: Villa Margarita is a traditionally-built group of apartments and rooms to let, and definitely a value-for-money choice for unique, unforgettable holidays at the wonderful island of Mykonos, Greece! It is situated just 800m far from Mykonos capital town (where there is the picturesque Port Area, the island's heart of shopping and an exciting nightlife with fancy restaurants and famous bars) overlooking Megali Ammos beach having a memorable view of the sunset.

name: Aloe Boutique & Suites
description: Aloe Boutique & Suites is a brand new, 5* modern accommodation facility, located in the picturesque village of Almyrida in Chania. The hotel is an adults only concept and offers 57 luxurious rooms in various categories. The design of the hotel was made with love and imagination, creating maximum comfort and relaxation for the guests. Few steps from the hotel is the crystal clear waters of the Cretan sea and the golden beach of Almyrida bay. Facilities include gym, sauna & wellness club. Aloe Boutique & Suites shares one core concept, inspired by modern Cretan architecture with every room having its own individuality. Welcome to your Holiday Elixir!

name: Savoy Sharm El Sheikh
description: Savoy Sharm El Sheikh is located near Ras Mohammed National Park inside SOHO SQUARE, the 5-star hotel offers 136 sea view rooms, 55 pool view rooms, 161 garden view rooms, 46 triple rooms, 2 special care rooms, 13 diplomatic suites, and 1 presidential suite. The hotel also features a private beach, 5 swimming pools 3 adult pools (2 heated in winter time) and 2 children's pools (1 heated in winter time) , 5 Bars (1 pool Bar) , and 6 restaurants Savoy hotel offers different types of meal plans that ensures you trying everything starting from the hotel’s main restaurant to Soho Square different restaurants and cuisines; standard Bed and breakfast, half board, full board, S-Class (ultra all-inclusive concept) , and half and full board dine around option (which SOHO Square restaurants as well) Diving or at least snorkeling with a PADI approved dive school on the beach. In the hotel we can find tennis, squash and beach volleyball courts as well as a modern gym facility . Sauna and Jacuzzis, as well as a range of beauty and spa treatments. Each room features adjustable air conditioning, WiFi access, mini-bar, en suite bathroom and hairdryer, and a private terrace overlooking our gardens , pools, or the beach.

name: Pyramisa Hotel Luxor
description: The biggest 4 star hotel directly on the Nile in the heart of Luxor. Most of the large 350 rooms and 100 family suites enjoy panoramic views of the Nile, gardens and 2 large swimming pools. In addition to a heated swimming-pool, resort facilities include Italian, Chinese and oriental restaurants, bar, lounge, children playground and a gym.

name: Iberotel Luxor
description: Iberotel Luxor has an excellent location direclty overlooking the banks of the Nile & is ideal for romantic getaways, honeymoons or those fascinated by the marvels and mysteries of ancient Egypt. Centrally located in Luxor, it's just ten minutes walking from the Temple of Luxor. This four-star property offers spectacular views of the river, the west bank & the distant hills of Thebes from its rooms & from the verdant garden terrace. Near the hotel, the ferry crossing to the west bank will allow you to visit the Valley of the Kings, Valley of the Queens, Hatshepsut Temple and the Memnon Colossus while the Temple of Karnak is just three km away. The hotel is the winner of Tripadvisor Certificate of Excellence for 2012 & 2011, the winner of E-cristal certificate for 2012,Iso -14001 for 2012, Travelife Gold Award winner for 2011 & 2010 & the Cristal Certificate of Excellence 2010.

name: Cherry Maryski Hotel
description: One of Alexandria's business hotels, Cherry Maryski Hotel, enjoys one of the most idyllic locations, founded in the downtown area within 5 minutes walking distance of many historical sites. The city hotel is perfectly positioned near most of the vital zones & easy access to some of the most remarkable areas in Alexandria. The 4 star city hotel offers 192 guestrooms, all of which have been designed to ensure your stay with us to be as enjoyable as possible.

name: Marriott Mena House, Cairo
description: Marriott Mena House, Cairo comprises 331 luxury rooms and suites, many boasting views of the Pyramids, the lavish gardens or the swimming pool, four restaurants and lounges, expansive indoor and outdoor meetings and banquet facilities, a heated swimming pool and a health club. Discover our unparalleled and unique hotel in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Desert Rose Resort
description: Just a fifteen-minute drive from Hurghada Airport and 16 km from Hurghada city center, Desert Rose’s 1km pristine beach and its idyllic 40,000 square meter natural lagoon with golden sands is a choice location for enjoying a unique stretch of private beachfront, providing a wonderful environment for fun-packed activities or simply relishing the stunning year-round unbeatable Red Sea climate.

name: Jaz Sharm Dreams
description: Sharm Dreams Resort is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Sharm El Sheikh, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Sharm Dreams Hotel offers guests paid internet access. The resort features a concierge and room service. Plus, Sharm Dreams Hotel offers a pool and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Sharm El Sheikh, Dreams is located a short distance from Ghibli Raceway (1.2 mi) and Hollywood Sharm El Sheikh (1.3 mi). When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Palm Lounge Cafe, Pharaoh Cafe, and Time Out Cafe Sharm, which are some cafes that are popular with locals and out-of-towers alike.

name: Moevenpick Resort El Quseir
description: Red Sea wonders and plentiful marine life. Seemingly part of the natural environment between sandy mountains and deepest blue seas is the Mövenpick Resort El Quseir. Built in traditional Nubian style, this relaxed resort instantly makes you feel at peace. 250 rooms are set in clusters of stone-clad bungalows with high domed ceilings in atmospheric style. A beautiful private sandy beach and stunning coral reef tempt guests to explore the bays pristine underwater. The myriad of marine life inhabiting the resort's own house reef, amaze divers and snorkelers alike.

name: Triumph Plaza Hotel
description: Triumph Plaza Hotel is a upmarket hotel conveniently situated in Heliopolis area which is the most attractive residential area it is only few minutes away from all Cairo’s hot spots as Salah Salem avenue Cairo’s main road , Cairo international airport , Cairo international conference centre and biggest shopping areas in Cairo Enjoy delicious fine taste and exquisite cuisines from all around the world we bring to you our Seehraz Restaurant offers sumptuous buffet breakfast, Lunch and Dinner for your choice. In our Lebanese restaurant, you are welcome to choose from our large à-la-carte Menu, or which boasts a wide selection of freshly prepared Lebanese Specialities. The atmosphere in our Restaurant is always lively, yet cosy and authentic. Not only our many international Guests appreciate the atmosphere, also many Locals come in regularly and enjoy their meal. ‘Up to you’ coffee shop is the place where is you can enjoy your drink and home made pastries and bakery In rehana Enjoy the beautiful summer evenings on our Garden Terrace and take in the unique atmosphere! Not only Unwind in our exquisite Executive Lounge when you book any of our rooms & suites.

name: Steigenberger Golf Resort
description: On its own serene peninsula surrounded by tranquil lagoons, the fully renovated, five-star Steigenberger Golf Resort El Gouna brings Nubian flair to the charming Red Sea. Flourishing gardens lead to the secluded lagoon beaches as well as to the vast 18-hole championship golf course, offering guests complete exclusivity. Attracting golfers for its year-round sunshine, the upscale resort also appeals to couples, groups and families with its myriad of facilities.

name: Novotel Sharm El Sheikh
description: The Novotel Sharm El Sheikh is a 5 star hotel located on the picturesque Naama Bay in the Egyptian seaside resort town of Sharm el Sheikh. Enjoy the sun and the sea on the private beach or by the heated swimming pools. Whether with your partner or family, enjoy a unique holiday doing whatever you please. The Kids Club offers different programs of popular sports and a childrens pool. Relax at the bars, dine indoors or out at a choice of 3 restaurants, or enjoy the spa with oriental Hammam and massages.

name: Hilton Marsa Alam Nubian Resort
description: The Hotel has been opened in July 2011. Offers a unique Nubian Themed experience. Located on the Abu Dabab Bay with 4 swimming pools (2 heated in winter).The Hotel bedrooms are in individual blocks of 12 to 24 rooms on 2 floors. All bedroom blocks are located in large landscaped gardens.

name: Charmillion Club Resort
description: Charmillion Hotels and Resorts offers a bouquet of beautiful four properties; Charmillion Club Resort is the luxurious five star property that was tailored to guarantee an unforgettable vacation. Whether you prefer to let yourself be pampered at the spa, or discover the adventurous yet tranquil destination of Sharm El Sheikh. Charmillion Club Resort is located at the entrance of the Nabq bay, it is just 5 km from the airport and 20 km from Neama Bay, 30 km from Old Market, which gives a great access to the vibrant city of Sharm El Sheikh. We are wholeheartedly committed to providing our guests with the value they deserve. Our innovative Dine-Around concept is tailored to give you an unforgettable culinary experience around Charmillion Sea Life Resort and Charmillion Gardens Aqua Park.

name: SeaGull Beach Resort
description: Our deluxe four star resort is the perfect location for a wonderful holiday under the warm Egyptian sun. Only a few minutes from Hurghada airport and within walking distance to downtown Hurghada. The Sea Gull Hotel is the perfect location, where you can combine great fun and action with days full of wellness, sun and relaxation. Seagull Beach Resort 4 star deluxe situated in the heart of hurghada directly on the blue water of the red sea, 10 km from the airport. May 2015 a comprehensive renovation has been done for the following: Rooms Restaurants Bars Food court at the beach (Chinese,Oriental,Italian & Indian) Fish Restaurant

name: SUNRISE Alex Avenue Hotel
description: SUNRISE Alex Avenue Hotel is situated directly in the heart of Alexandria, combining a stellar seafront location, a secluded private beach with business amenities of a five-star hotel. The resort features a variety of restaurants, bars & cafes, a fully equipped gym (16+) and a full-serviced spa & beauty salon (chargeable). Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort. The hotel features a total of 167 rooms, which all enjoy a stunning sea view. The rooms come with a SAT LED TV, a safe box, a minibar, tea & coffee facilities and a terrace or balcony. The resort offers 5 restaurants in addition to the View Cafe with uninterrupted views of the Mediterranean Sea. Besides a private sandy beach, SUNRISE Alex Avenue Hotel features 2 swimming pools, a kid’s pool and a tennis court. With a large variety of conference and meeting rooms, SUNRISE Alex Avenue Resort offers several venues for your event. Additionally, the hotel is prepared to host your meetings, conferences, weddings or any other type of event at the open beach side, poolside or garden spaces. The hotel is located only 3 km from the city centre and the stunning Bibliotheca Alexandria.

name: SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select-
description: Highlights: • Luxurious Family Resort with aqua park • Private beach with access to coral reef • Swim-up and jacuzzi rooms • Stunning infinity pool • Adults only sanctuary • 1 buffet and 5 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits when booking all-inclusive) • Royal club privileges upon booking selected suites Experience ultimate luxury and serenity at SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select- in Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt. The 5-star resort has been fully revamped and has been designed to offer guests a luxurious vacation beyond expectations. SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort comprises of 440 vastly spacious Rooms & Suites all of which exhibit a modern, state-of-the-art concept. Upgrade your vacation and enjoy your stay in any of the lavishly designed Swim-Up and Jacuzzi Rooms & Suites. Royal Club Privileges can be enjoyed when booking any of the Resort’s Suites. Every room comes with satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. This elegant resort offers a wide variety of culinary delights, including 1 international restaurant and 5 à-la-carte restaurants serving Italian, Egyptian, Indian, and Mongolian Cuisine and delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). With a total of 12 Bars, Cafés and Pubs, scattered through the Resorts’ premises you will enjoy a perfect mix of fun and relaxation. The newest addition is the Latitude Sky Bar promising spectacular views of the Red Sea. With a choice of three large heated outdoor swimming pools, along with a separate breathtaking infinity pool, and an Aqua Park that keeps the whole family splashing, enjoyment is guaranteed for everyone. Additionally, the Resort features a fully equipped gym (16+), and a high-end spa & beauty salon (chargeable). SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort offers a private beach with access to a jetty, giving you direct access to the beautiful clear waters in which you can discover the wonders of the Red Sea’s coral reef. Located 15 km (10 min) to Sharm El Sheikh Centre and 25km (20 min) to Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet or à-la-carte restaurants (unlimited reservations), snacks from 12:00-17:00, 23:00-01:00, local alcoholic beverages from 10:00-00:00, water and hot beverages 24/7, minibar with water & soft drinks, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/ services such as diving, spa treatments are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

name: Titanic Beach Spa & Aqua Park
description: Titanic Beach Spa & Aqua Park is located on the amazing sandy shores of the red sea, offering it guests a wide variety of fabulous activities making it a dream come true vacation. The resort will have the biggest Aqua Park in Hurghada, with its numerous water slides, wave pool, rafting river, an endless adventure of pleasure.

name: Caves Beach Resort Hurghada
description: The hotel exterior design is in a unique and wonderful Stone-Rock - Mountain style same the landscape and pool areas with integrated lights and plants around the pool and in all public areas. All the rooms are also fully cave-style in a high quality finish and made in wood and rock.

name: Pickalbatros Laguna Vista Hotel
description: See why so many travelers make Laguna Vista Beach Resort their hotel of choice when visiting Nabq Bay. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a romantic setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.

name: Serenity Fun City
description: The Serenity Fun City is a 8-minute walk from the beach and located on the west bank of the Red Sea in the area of Makadi Bay. One of the most striking features is the Theme Park, a unique amusement park in the Red Sea Region, including the Aqua Park with a variety of water slides and pools for all age ranges, Luna park with various games, kids club, children's playgrounds, video games room and 6D cinema.. This Resort offers a main buffet restaurant and 5 a la carte restaurants - Italian, Asian, Oriental, Sea food menu, food court and 4 large bars either in the lobby or at the swimming pools with an aqua park view

name: Jaz Aquaviva
description: Jaz Aquaviva Resort has 487 guest rooms divided as follows: 436 Family Rooms, 50 Standard Rooms & 1 Suite with pool. Located in the heart of Madinat Makadi, the 5 star Jaz Aquaviva offers Makadi Water World featuring 50 adrenalin-pumping water slides and an 18-hole Championship Golf Course an extra charge. All rooms are equipped with an individually controlled air condition & feature a spacious balcony or terrace. Room features include: In-room safe box, Satellite TV & LCD screen, Minibar, hairdryer, shaver plug & cosmetic mirror, smoke detectors, tea & coffee making facilities

name: Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort
description: 5-star elegance in a picturesque location at Naama Bay. Inspire peace and comfort in beautifully designed hotel accommodations with luxury amenities, signature comforts, plush bedding, 24-hour room service and inspiring views.

name: Best View Pyramids Hotel
description: SUNSET PYRaMids Views an excellent choice for travelers visiting Giza, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and you can stay connected during your stay as SUNSET PYRaMids view Hotel offers guests free wifi. The hotel features a rooftop terrace and room service. Plus, SUNSET PYRaMids View offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available. If you like Mediterranean restaurants, SUNSET PYRaMids view is conveniently located near 139 Lounge Bar & Terrace, Felfela, and Restaurant El Dar Darak. If you’re looking for something to do, Pyramids of Giza (0.6 mi), Great Pyramid of Cheops (Khufu) (0.6 mi), and Great Sphinx (0.3 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of SUNSET PYRaMids view. Enjoy your stay in Giza

name: Steigenberger Nile Palace
description: The 5-star Steigenberger Nile Palace is situated in the heart of Luxor and provides modern accommodation with stunning views of the Nile. The spacious rooms are air-conditioned and feature satellite TV. Most rooms have a balcony and all are filled with natural light. Nile Palace Luxor Hotel is conveniently located within a short walk of Luxor's large shopping district. Guests can make use of the fitness center, sauna, and massage. Luxor Temple is 1 km away. Nile Palace Luxor offers a wide choice of restaurants, serving Lebanese, Italian, Fine Dining and international cuisine. Guests can make use of the fitness center and sauna. The hotel also offers a 24-hour front desk and the in house Travel Desk can help organize local tours. The East Bank is a great choice for travelers interested in temples, museums and history.

name: Uma Suites Parada del Marqués
description: Welcome to Hotel Uma Suites Parada del Marqués, your Seville “home away from home.” Uma Suites Parada del Marqués hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Seville, Uma Suites Parada del Marqués is located a short distance from Triana (0.3 mi) and Torre Giralda (0.6 mi). As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available. Guests have access to a concierge while staying at Uma Suites Parada del Marqués. In addition, the hotel offers breakfast, which will help make your Seville trip additionally gratifying. While in Seville be sure to experience local dumplings favorites at Perro Viejo Tapas, Ovejas Negras, or La Bartola. Best of all, Hotel Uma Suites Parada del Marqués makes it easy to experience many great Seville attractions like Seville Cathedral, Plaza Nueva, and Glorieta de Becquer, which are some popular monuments and statues. Hotel La Parada del Marques puts the best of Seville at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Hotel Las Arenas, Affiliated By Meliá
description: Hotel Las Arenas, Affiliated by Meliá is situated in front of Benalmadena’s Bil Bil castle and 25 metres from the sandy’s Santa Ana Beach, a short walk to the night life of Puerto Marina and at 8 Km from the airport. Modern hotel with 160 rooms, 3 lifts, swimming pool, restaurant with buffet service, two lounge areas, bar salon, pool bar, and a new Sky Bar on the roof top area, parking (15€ per day) and Wi-Fi free. Comfy standard rooms with side sea views, 2 or 3 beds, satellite TV, telephone, minibar, air conditioning, safety deposit box. Premium Rooms with front sea view are available. Outside there are a Pool bar, Outdoor Jacuzzi, Solarium, sunbeds and parasols. Fantastic roof terrace situated on 7th floor with stunning sea views and very relaxing, with two levels: a fabulous sun deck with sunbeds, parasols and chairs, and a smart, modern furnishing chill- out bar. Live music and shows nightly. Activities: Golf course 2km away under separate. Pets not allowed.

name: Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis
description: The Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis, located between Puerto Portals and Palmanova, was inaugurated in 1964 and is one of the most emblematic hotels of the Son Caliu area; just 12 km from the city centre of Palma de Mallorca and 25 km from the airport. Our main virtue is the facilities, commodities and friendly service we all strive to offer our guests to ensure that they enjoy a pleasant, relaxed stay.

name: Hotel Zinema7
description: Built on the foundations of what was San Sebastian's biggest multiplex cinema for four decades, the Hotel Zinema7, previously the Astoria7, is a reflection of the city's passion for film. A stellar hotel in which every room and every corner pays tribute to the stars that have been at the Zinemaldia, our International Film Festival. Located in the peaceful district of Amara, its privileged location invites you to take a pleasant 10-minute stroll down the recently renovated green Sancho el Sabio avenue to the city's romantic area, follow the bank of the Urumea river down to its mouth at the Kursaal, or pedal to the busy heart of the Old Quarter in 5 minutes. A stroll with attention to detail will reveal the most authentic San Sebastian to you. We are a hotel, yes, but a hotel full of stars.

name: Sonder Casa Luz
description: Welcome to Casa Luz, your El Raval escape in Barcelona. A classic sandstone exterior meets minimalist interior design. Each space features warm wooden furnishings, amber tilework, and cable television. Don’t worry about tidying up — daily housekeeping is complimentary. Breakfast at the rooftop restaurant is available for purchase. And with live evening music on the terrace, there’s no better place to savor the city views. This vibrant city is yours to discover, starting at Casa Luz. Use the Sonder app to navigate your stay from start to finish. Check in. Request amenities. Connect to WiFi. Contact customer support. All via our small (but mighty) app. Whatever you need, we’ve got you covered.

name: Hotel Tayko Bilbao
description: Tayko Bilbao is a design hotel of 53 rooms located in the old part of Bilbao. It was built in 1924 and has been completely restored respecting its original structure. The rooms of Tayko Bilbao stand out for their design and the confort of the beds. The hotel has La Bodega de Ola and a restaurant called Ola awarded with a Michelin Star, both managed by the Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui. It is 200 metres from Arriaga Theatre, 300 meters of Catedral de Santiago and 15 minutes' walk from Guggheneim Museum.

name: ME Barcelona
description: Located in the heart of Barcelona, near Passeig de Gràcia, this hotel is regarded as a cultural hotspot where you can find art, design, fashion and music. It is a source of inspiration and creativity for all its visitors. It boasts rooms and suites featuring an urban style, and restaurants offering Mediterranean cuisine, along with tempting cocktails. Furthermore, it also features a rooftop swimming pool, a spa, a fully equipped gym, an urban garden, a Rooftop Bar and over 600 m2 of versatile spaces. Pets allowed (extra charge).

name: Sixtytwo Hotel
description: The Sixtytwo Hotel Barcelona is the perfect hotel for those who enjoy the finer things in life and who appreciate privacy and personalised service. Located on the emblematic Paseo de Gracia surrounded by Barcelona’s best shopping, it is right in the heart of the latest fashion trends and Gaudi’s most representative buildings. The Sixtytwo is an authentic boutique hotel where design and modernism harmonise perfectly.Located between Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, The Sixtytwo has preserved its 1897 modernist façade and interiors and coupled them with designer furnishings. Tasteful touches courtesy of Moooi, Vitra, B&B and Philippe Starck give life to the hotel lobby and lounge, while the comfort of its 45 rooms is in part thanks to televisions by Bang&Olufsen, telephones by Jacob Jensen, taps by Tangent, Etro bathroom products, iPod stations, intelligent lighting systems and Nespresso coffee machines. At The Sixtytwo, all guests enjoy complimentary internet access. Our breakfast offer, including both a buffet prepared with fresh quality products as well as dishes à la carte cooked to order, will not leave you indifferent.The Sixtytwo Cocktail Lounge is open from 5pm until midnight. With a peaceful and cosmopolitan ambience, it is a meeting point for those in search of an extended wine list and a varied gin and tonic selection.

name: Gallery Hotel
description: Gallery Hotel, part of the Gallery Hoteles group, is a boutique hotel with 110 rooms that have been fully refurbished, located in the heart of l’Eixample, by Paseo de Gracia. The hotel stands out by virtue of its customer service and care, and it has two iconic spaces to enjoy fine cuisine. The restaurant, SINTONIA, has a courtyard patio surrounded by gardens and it offers Mediterranean cuisine based on reworked traditional recipes. The rooftop bar with pool, The TOP, is open from April to October, offers cocktails and food, and the best cosmopolitan atmosphere in the city.. The hotel also has eight meeting rooms and three terraces for business meetings and private events.

name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel
description: At the center of the city Gothic quarter of Barcelona, in one of the narrow medieval streets filled with local shops and Catalan local cafes and only a few meters away from the famous La Rambla, Kimpton Vividora Hotel awaits. Plaza Catalunya, the hub of the city and the shopping area are just around the corner, ideal for a late stroll or some shopping. The hotel also features a magnificent rooftop terrace and a pool with views of Barcelona rooftops and some of its famous landmarks.

name: Petit Palace Triball
description: Petit Palace triball has been renovated and transformed into a modern 3-star hotel. The hotel, which is both elegantly furnished and well equipped, offers all types of commodities and installations, free safety boxes, free Wi-fi Premium connection . All rooms are stylish and comfortable, with the latest in advanced technologies. We will be more than happy to attend your special requests (bed type, room views, special bedding for pets...) The staff is friendly and helpful and will be more than happy to inform you on the best restaurants, shopping and places to visit. Amongst other free services, the hotel offers free WIFI connection throughout the building and free bicycles rent (subject to availability). A luminous meeting room with exterior views is available with free Internet connection , making your stay in the Petit Place Triball ideal for business and vacation travellers.

name: Hotel Adriano Sevilla
description: Adriano Hotel in Seville city is located in the historical, monumental and commercial city center. In a privileged environment, is the perfect place to visit Seville, for leisure tourism as business in Seville, fairs, events, festivals, and folk...Our facilities, cozy and elegant, are in an eighteenth century manor house renovated. We offer an affordable luxury, the best service, rest and comfort for your stay in Seville is unique and original.The hotel's decor is classic, wood, antique furniture, marble floors... The hotel has typical patios decorated with plants, that provide most of the rooms, where you can enjoy a quiet and relaxing atmosphere.Hotel in the center of Seville CitySituated between Santa Cruz and Triana, just a few steps from the Bullring and the Guadalquivir River, and close to main monuments like the Cathedral, the Giralda and the Alcazar.

name: Iberostar Grand El Mirador
description: Imagine the perfect adult getaway on the seafront in Tenerife, the largest of Spain's Canary Islands, where elegance and unique architecture set a romantic mood. Iberostar Grand El Mirador is a 5* hotel where you will enjoy a stay filled with rest and relaxation, over 1,000 square meters of SPA Sensations, luxury facilities, three restaurants with responsibly sourced fish on the menu and large rooms with balconies. For an extra special touch, why not try Star Prestige La Balconada, with the best rooms, a personalised butler and concierge services, if this wasn't enough our reputation precedes us as offering the most exquisite service on the island.

name: Lani's Suites Deluxe
description: Located in Puerto del Carmen on the beach front and surrounded by a wide range of leisure facilities and restaurants, Lani's Suites Deluxe permits you to experience the highest level of luxury and detail. Each of the 25 exclusive suites were created to offer guests the best views over the Atlantic Ocean, surrounded by the comfort and harmony that only Dadlani Kumar could have managed to source for you.

name: Es Princep
description: With the glittering Palma Bay and the historical city wall outside your hotel window, elegant Es Princep (Opening Spring 2018) not only prides itself on sumptuous surroundings and the old towns most beautiful sea view, but is also perfectly located to explore Palma de Mallorca with ease. The 68 luxuriously elegant rooms not only meet the modern traveler’s needs and exceed their expectations, but are blissfully light and boast unforgettable views. The soulful use of stone, wood and leather pay homage to traditional Mallorcan country fincas.

name: Hotel Kramer
description: Hotel Kramer is hotel alongside the Congress Palace, it has 70 rooms, all on the exterior with elegant and modern decoration, as well as being endowed with cold/hot air-conditioning, latest generation TV LED with international channels, free WI-FI and a fully-fitted bathroom with shower, hairdryer and amenities. It also offers a 24 hour reception, a daily cleaning service, cots on request and a transfer service from the airport for a single charge. The hotel has a cafeteria/restaurant "Kram Bar" where you can enjoy our buffet a la carte breakfast, try out a Mediterranean cuisine menu or have a drink whilst enjoying the broadcasts of the main sports' competitions on the giant screen. Check-in time: as from 2 p.m. Check-out time: Until 12 midday Important: This property does not accept bookings of students groups or groups of bachelor / stag parties

name: H10 Cubik
description: Opened in 2015, the H10 Cubik is an exclusive, four-star superior hotel located in the heart of Barcelona, just a few feet away from the cathedral and the city's historic centre. The hotel is in a modern building which comprises geometric shapes and is reminiscent of the brutalist architecture of the mid-twentieth century. Its cutting-edge interior design includes futuristic touches and pure colours, as well as being flooded with natural light thanks to its large windows. The hotel offers large, bright rooms, the Market restaurant, Robotik Bar and the Atik terrace located on the eighth floor with a plunge pool and spectacular panoramic views of the city.

name: Gran Hotel Inglés
description: The first luxury hotel to be built in Madrid, Gran Hotel Inglés dates back to 1886. Completely restored and renovated under the artistic direction of Rockwell Group, the hotel has become one of the finest properties in today’s Madrid. Situated in an incomparable location in the city center, it is near the cultural, commercial and leisure areas of the capital. Among its many attributes is a sophisticated restaurant which combines traditional and innovative cuisine, as well as a comprehensive fitness center with top-of-the-line exercise equipment, offering, a varied program of services and activities, and a complete wellness area with a wide range of exclusive treatments and products.

name: Hotel Bidaia
description: The Hotel is located in a unique villa in the central Gros neighborhood, designed in 1912 by the architect Lucas Alday. This hotel is part of our history, part of a way of life from those days. The hotel also has a restaurant with 2 beautiful terraces. Each room is unique and different, built respecting original materials such as wood and stone. The rooms are spacious and bright, some have a terrace or balcony and views of Mount Ulia.

name: Catalonia Puerta Del Sol
description: Catalonia Moratin hotel, which opened its doors in August 2002, is conveniently situated near the famous Golden Triangle (the Prado Museum, the Thyssen Bornemisza Museum and the Reina Sofia Museum), adjacent to the historic nucleus of the city which includes the Puerta del Sol and the Plaza Mayor. It is only a few metres away from the Plaza Santa Ana, known to be one of the best places for tapas nationwide, and close to the most popular theatres in town.

name: Legado Alcazar
description: Crossing the threshold of this new hotel, ideally located in the centre of Seville, assures an unforgettable stay in what for many will be a yet undiscovered Seville. Built and protected within the historical complex of the Reales Alcázares Palace, its 18 rooms, all uniquely decorated, as well as its courtyards, make it a point of reference for travellers who will with no doubt enjoy the comfort and quality of its facilities and services. Built upon important Moorish, late medieval and contemporary archeological remains, visitors will be taken aback by the beauty of the rehabilitated elements such as the wall that borders with the Alcázar, fountains, canalizations, pottery, and floors from past centuries. Discover the delights of staying at luxury accommodation whilst reliving centuries of history in the heart of Seville, exclusive sensations for a new generation of traveller.

name: Hotel Leku Eder
description: El hotel Leku Eder es un hotel de estilo familiar con vista al océano desde el Monte Igeldo. El hotel se encuentra a menos de 4 km. desde el centro de la ciudad de Donostia / San Sebastián y tiene una buena conexión de autobús al centro, así como un aparcamiento gratuito para nuestros huéspedes. Todas las habitaciones están equipadas con baño, teléfono, televisión y conexión wifi gratuita. Tenemos una soleada terraza donde nuestros huéspedes pueden relajarse o leer plácidamente. La sala de desayunos está a su disposición, con una colección de tés e infusiones. Dicha sala cuenta con un microhondas, vajilla y cubertería, pudiendo hacer uso de la misma en caso de que traigan su propia comida.
